item.title: Need help about int (compiler with 1 error)
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

    public int maxRangeHit() {
        double d = 0.0D;
        double d1 = playerLevel[playerRanged];
        d += 1.399D + d1 * 0.00125D;
        d += d1 * 0.11D;
        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 882) {
            d *= 1.042D;
        }
        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 884) {
            d *= 1.044D;
        }
        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 886) {
            d *= 1.1339999999999999D;
        }
        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 888) {
            d *= 1.2D;
        }
        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 890) {
            d *= 1.3500000000000001D;
        }
        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 892) {
            d *= 1.6000000000000001D;
        }
        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 4740) {
            d *= 1.95D;
        }
        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837) {
            d *= 1.55D;
        }
        return (int)d;
    }

I’ve added this bit,

return (int)d;

Read full topic
item.source: Need help about int (compiler with 1 error)

item.title: Need help about int (compiler with 1 error)
item.dc:creator: @raulhenriq raulhenriq
item.description:
@raulhenriq wrote:

Well well…
First of all… I got a old source, jordiescape.
Im trying to add real ranged hits on this with that code:

public int maxRangeHit(){ double d = 0.0D; double d1 = playerLevel[playerRanged]; d += 1.399D + d1 * 0.00125D; d += d1 * 0.11D; if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 882){ d *= 1.042D; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 884){ d *= 1.044D; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 886){ d *= 1.1339999999999999D; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 888){ d *= 1.2D; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 890){ d *= 1.3500000000000001D; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 892){ d *= 1.6000000000000001D; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 4740){ d *= 1.95D; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837){ d *= 1.55D; } }

And the compiler gives me that error:

client.java:12108: missing return statement } ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Pressione qualquer tecla para continuar. . .

So can anyone please help me?Cause ranged hit like 80 on this source if you wear some armors, cause it
uses same as melee attacks maxhit base, so please help me…
thanks…

Read full topic
